title: The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild
overview: Explore the vast world of Hyrule and defeat Calamity Ganon.
soundtrackName: The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild Original Soundtrack

title: God of War Ragnarök
overview: Kratos and Atreus face their destiny as the world heads toward Ragnarök.

title: Elden Ring
overview: Venture through the Lands Between and rise as the Elden Lord in this epic open-world RPG.

title: Hollow Knight
platform: Nintendo Switch, PC, PS4, Xbox One
overview: Descend into the ruined kingdom of Hallownest and uncover its hidden secrets in this atmospheric adventure.

title: Cyberpunk 2077
overview: Step into the neon city of Night City as V, a mercenary with customizable cybernetic implants.

title: Red Dead Redemption 2
overview: Live the life of an outlaw in America’s unforgiving heartland at the dawn of the modern age.

title: Stardew Valley
platform: Nintendo Switch, PC, PS4, Xbox One, Mobile
overview: Build the farm of your dreams, grow crops, raise animals, and build relationships in this beloved indie sim.

title: The Witcher 3: Wild Hunt
platform: PS5, Nintendo Switch, Xbox Series X, PC
overview: Play as Geralt of Rivia, a monster slayer for hire, as you search for your missing adopted daughter.
soundtrackName: The Witcher 3: Wild Hunt Original Game Soundtrack

title: Super Mario Odyssey
overview: Join Mario on a globe-trotting adventure to rescue Princess Peach from Bowser’s wedding plans.

title: Hades
platform: Nintendo Switch, PC, PS5, Xbox Series X
overview: Battle your way out of the Underworld as Zagreus, the immortal son of Hades, in this rogue-like masterpiece.

title: Final Fantasy VII Remake
overview: Revisit the iconic city of Midgar in this reimagined version of the beloved RPG classic.
soundtrackName: Final Fantasy VII Remake Original Soundtrack

title: Spider-Man 2
overview: Swing through New York City as Peter Parker and Miles Morales in this thrilling superhero adventure.
